QMath Matrix Library Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
Adams3Integrator< T >Numerical integration using Adam's 3'rd order method
ColumnVector< size, T >A class for column vectors
Differentiator< T >This is the base class for differentiators
Differentiator4O< T >Fourth order differentation followed by low-pass filtering
HighpassFilter< T >A high-pass second order butterworth filter
Integrator< T >The base class for integrators
LowpassFilter< T >A second order butterworth lowpass filter
MathExceptionRun-time exception handling for the math library
Matrix< numRows, numColumns, T >Methods for mathematical operations on matrices
MatrixBase< T >This is a pure virtual base class for Matrix
MatrixInitializer< T >This class is used internally by the library to initialize the Matrix and its derived class objects
ODESolverRK4< T >Solver for ordinary differential equations using 4th order Runge Kutta method
RowVector< size, T >A class for row vectors
TransformThe class Transform represents a 4x4 transformation matrix
Vector< size, T >The class Vector provides is equivalent to a ColumnVector object
VectorBase< T >The pure virtual base class for ColumnVector, RowVector and Vector classes
